kpi.name: M8017C11

kpi_info.title: Inter System Handover attempts to UTRAN with SRVCC per neighbor cell relationship
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of Inter System Handover attempts to UTRAN with SRVCC (Single Radio Voice Call Continuity, 3GPP TS 23.216) per neighbor cell relationship. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:HANDOVER COMMAND message (source eNB <- MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) in case that this message is received in response to the preparation of an Inter System Handover to UTRAN with SRVCC (Single Radio Voice Call Continuity, 3GPP TS 23.216).

kpi.kpi_alias: Inter System Handover attempts to UTRAN with SRVCC per neighbor cell relationship
